properties.Name: Abri Schweizersbild
properties.description:
Type: Cave or Rock Shelter County/Region: Schaffhausen
Pos Accuracy: 5 (5 is best)
Lat: 47.72388    Long: 8.64007
Rock Shelter in Schaffhausen. In Abri cave many Palaeolithic artefacts and Neolithic burials has been found. One of the artefacts is a plate with engravings of 2 horses.
